sentence.text: Silencing expression of G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway and regulation of transcription, DNA-templated in the human oral cancer cell line OECM-1 confirmed that those genes play essential roles in oral cancer cell invasion.

entity.text: G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Analysis of clinical samples of oral cancer found a strong correlation of these genes with short survival, especially transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway expression associated with metastasis.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Our study identified a unique gene signature - G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway and regulation of transcription, DNA-templated - which may be involved in oral cancer lymph node metastasis

entity.text: G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
